channel.title: Another Quick Question
channel.description:
Okay just a few quick questions.
If I want people to connect to my server do they need to portforward aswell?
If No one can connect to my server do I need to change something in the client.java?

item.title: Another Quick Question
item.dc:creator: @str2own99 str2own99
item.description:
@str2own99 wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:7, topic:372277”][quote author=Josh21210 link=topic=468336.msg3423904#msg3423904 date=1291760329]
Okay, so let me get this right… In the source I need to change it? not in the client
[/quote]
You have to use the No-Ip and change the Ip in the Client Files to your No-Ip.[/quote]ye search for 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 and change to urs

Read full topic

item.title: Another Quick Question
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Josh21210:

Okay, so let me get this right… In the source I need to change it? not in the client

You have to use the No-Ip and change the Ip in the Client Files to your No-Ip.

item.title: Another Quick Question
item.dc:creator: @Josh21210 Josh21210
item.description:
@Josh21210 wrote:

str2own99:

on some clients it atomaticly connects ur source and on some u need to change on bouth

So lets say I am using DeltaScape source and trying to get people to connect through moparscape webclient they should be able to? Thats the problem I am having right now

Read full topic

item.title: Another Quick Question
item.dc:creator: @str2own99 str2own99
item.description:
@str2own99 wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:2, topic:372277”][quote author=Josh21210 link=topic=468336.msg3423853#msg3423853 date=1291757763]
Okay just a few quick questions.

If I want people to connect to my server do they need to portforward aswell?

If No one can connect to my server do I need to change something in the client.java?
[/quote]

  1. No.

  2. Yes, this is client sided at least for the most part.[/quote]ye but for second question u need to change the ip to your no-ip, ip

Read full topic
